featured.text: Capoeiristas learned to camouflage the forbidden fights with singing, clapping, and dancing as though it were simply entertainment.

definition.zh_def: 拍手，通常用來表示讚賞或歡迎的行為。
definition.en_def: The act of striking the palms of the hands together to produce a sound, typically to show appreciation or approval.
definition.example: The audience showed their appreciation by clapping after the performance.
